Description:
Detects suspicious Spring framework exceptions that could indicate exploitation attempts

Author: Thomas Patzke
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Spring Framework Exceptions
Query: sourcetype="spring-*" ("AccessDeniedException" OR "CsrfException" OR "InvalidCsrfTokenException" OR "MissingCsrfTokenException" OR "CookieTheftException" OR "InvalidCookieException" OR "RequestRejectedException")
